data.name: MageCosmos
data.detailed_description:
MageCosmos is built for global users to meet friends, play games, and discover new things together. It’s a unique virtual world consisting of an island and other magical spaces, and of course, you can just chill and relax here.

1/unique Art & Design


This is a beautiful world consisting of islands, but it’s not typical, it may look a bit magical...

2/ Start Your Journey Here


Choose your own avatar, use a voice changer and give yourself some tag to help people know you better, there are portals and magical bookshelf to access different spaces or games quickly, everything is on your island!

3/ Hangout With Friends


Yes, you can just chill and relax with friends or just by yourself, or happen to attend an event held on the island, or visit a world with different culture, we’re sure it’s fun!

4/ Play Games Now !


There are several games with different themes that you may find interesting, why not bring your friends to try?

data.short_description: MageCosmos is a VR platform for global users to meet, play and discover together. We have immersive multiplayer games with interesting themes like fly simulation, farming, tower defense...This is also a place for you and friend to relax yourselves, it's definitely worth your visting !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
